sentence.Network_en: They do everything according to Hoyle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一切都按照规定办理.

sentence.Network_en: It's not according to Hoyle to hit a man when he's down.
sentence.Network_cn: 打已经倒在地上的人是不公平的.

sentence.Network_en: Hoyle, Cynthia L . Traffic Calming . Planners Advisory Service Report # 456, American Planning Association. Jul 1995.
sentence.Network_cn: 着〈交通稳静化〉, 规划者谘询服务报告 # 456号, 美国规划协会, 1995年一月.
